Posts.EditableText:

Like how early on in the game you can type in "Ask Sam about _" ? I would rather have it now be where the character has a conversation where they have options to choose from and events that occur based around their choices. 

I honestly have no idea if this question makes any sense, sorry!

If you are talking about editor options, then you can't change it. You either work on text adventure (type in commands), or gamebook (choose an option/response). 

If you mean gameplay wise... it is up to you how many options you give to the player.

I have a feeling I did not answer your question, but it is not clear what are you looking for.
